paper_abstract: Because it is difficult to predict access needs in advance and the limitations of formal policy languages it is difficult to completely define an access control policy ahead of the actual use. We suggest the use of an policy language which allows for override of denied access in some cases for increased flexibility. The overrides should be audited and we suggest that the access control policy can be used for finding the people who should perform the audit.
paper_title: Towards a mechanism for discretionary overriding of access control
